members.name: SpeechRecognitionError.error
members.description: Returns the type of error raised.

parameters.name: aborted
parameters.description: Speech input was aborted in some manner, perhaps by some user-agent-specific behavior like a button the user can press to cancel speech input.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Network communication required for completing the recognition failed.

parameters.name: not-allowed
parameters.description: The user agent disallowed any speech input from occurring for reasons of security, privacy or user preference.

parameters.name: service-not-allowed
parameters.description: The user agent disallowed the requested speech recognition service, either because the user agent doesn't support it or because of reasons of security, privacy or user preference. In this case it would allow another more suitable speech recognition service to be used instead.

parameters.name: bad-grammar
parameters.description: There was an error in the speech recognition grammar or semantic tags, or the chosen grammar format or semantic tag format was unsupported.

members.name: SpeechRecognitionError.message
members.description: Returns a message describing the error in more detail.
